The field is updated with obsolute weight of each index in the matrix. If more than one index is linked to a cell of matrix, this field would be updated with actual weightage in the matrix based on the cell weight and its weightage within the cell it is linked to.
Can be SIMPLE or MATRIX. In SIMPLE type, weights are user given.In MATRIX type, weights are taken from linked AM.MATRIX.
